availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Wales. Son of Morgan Richards and Ann Richards. Married to Mary A. Richards. Father of Emma Richards. Married to Married to Sarah Sutton Richards in Hamilton County, Ohio on July 5, 1855. Father of Ella Richards. Guide roller in Allegheny County, Pennsylvania, in 1850. Merchant in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860. Grocer in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Pennsylvania, Allegheny County, South Pittsburgh, p. 99B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1, p. 547.
Ohio Marriage Records, Hamilton County Courthouse, Cincinnati, Ohio, Hamilton County Marriages, Film #00000344469, p.99.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 3, June and July 1863, p. 193, p. 387 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on March 25, 2020).
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994043: Johnson, Kenton, Knott counties Deaths, p. 557.
